Name: LU 180 - Planning, Melrose Commons North, Bronx (C 150153 HUX)
Title: Resolution approving the Third Amended Melrose Commons Urban Renewal Plan for the Melrose Commons Urban Renewal Area, approving the designation of the area and approving the decision of the City Planning Commission on ULURP No. C 150153 HUX (L.U. No. 180).

History.Description: This Resolution was Approved by Committee
A motion was made that this Resolution be Approved, by Council approved by consent Roll Call.

By Council Members Greenfield and Dickens\par
\b\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928\b0\tab WHEREAS, the City Planning Commission filed with the Council on February 20, 2015 its decision and report dated February 18, 2015 (the "Decision"), on the application submitted by the New York City Department of Housing Preservation and Development ("HPD"), pursuant to Section 505 of Article 15 of the General Municipal Law of New York State and Section 197-c of the New York City Charter, regarding the proposed Third Amended Melrose Commons Urban Renewal Plan (the "Plan") for the Melrose Commons Urban Renewal Area (the "Area"). \expndtw-6 The proposed amended plan \expndtw-7 would include the following changes:\expndtw0\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\li792\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-547\li734\qj\cf1 1.\tab The elimination of the Melrose Crescent and the remapping of East 162\super nd\nosupersub  Street;\cf0\par
\pard\ltrpar\li734\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-547\li734\qj 2.\tab The reconfiguration and/or consolidation of five URA sites (Sites 51, 52, 53, 61 and 62) to match the boundaries of Sites B, C and the Future Open Space Site;\par
\pard\ltrpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-547\li734\qj\cf1 3.\tab Changes to land use designation on URA Site 51 from community facility to residential, commercial and/or community facility to allow for the Site C development;\cf0\par
\pard\ltrpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-547\li734\qj\cf1 4.\tab Changes to land use designation on URA Site 61 from public open space to residential, commercial, and/or community facility to allow for the Site C development;\cf0\par
\pard\ltrpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-547\li734\qj\cf1 5.\tab Changes to land use designation on URA Site 62 from residential to public open space; and \cf0\par
\pard\ltrpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-547\li734\qj\cf1 6.\tab The removal of height restrictions and modification of curb cut regulations affecting these URA sites.\cf0\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\expndtw-5\par
In addition, time schedule for the effectuation of the plan is proposed to be updated, \expndtw0 (ULURP No. C 150153 HUX), Community District 3, Borough of the Bronx (the "Application");\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj\tab\par
WHEREAS, the application is related to Applications C 150152 ZMX (L.U. No. 181), an amendment to the Zoning Map, Section Nos. 6a and 6c, changing portions of two blocks from R7-2 to R7-2/C1-4 and R8/C1-4; C 150154 HAX (L.U. No. 182), an urban development action area project designation, project approval and disposition of city-owned properties to developers to be selected by the Department of Housing Preservation and Development; and C 120323 MMX (L.U. No. 183), amendments to the City Map; \par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928       \tab WHEREAS, the City Planning Commission has certified that the Plan for the Area complies with the provisions of Article 15 of the General Municipal Law, conforms to the comprehensive community plan for the development of the municipality as a whole and is consistent with local objectives, and that the Plan is in conformity with the findings and designation of the Area;\par
      \tab\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928\tab WHEREAS, the Decision is subject to review and action by the Council pursuant to Section 197-d(b)(1) of the City Charter;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi864\qj\tx720\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj\tx720\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928 WHEREAS, the Area Designation is subject to review and action by the Council pursuant to Section 504 of the General Municipal Law;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928\tab WHEREAS, the Plan is subject to review and action by the Council pursuant to Section 505 of the General Municipal Law;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj\tx720\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928 WHEREAS, the New York City Department of Housing Preservation and Development submitted to the Council on February 18, 2015 its requests and recommendations dated February 9, 2015 regarding the Application;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928       \tab WHEREAS, upon due notice, the Council held a public hearing on the Decision and the Plan on March 9, 2015;\par
\par
      \tab WHEREAS, the Council has considered the land use and financial implications and other policy issues relating to the Decision and the Plan;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tab WHEREAS, the Council has considered the relevant environmental issues, including the negative declaration (CEQR No. \expndtw-2 14HPD030X\expndtw0 ) issued on October 14, 2014 (the \ldblquote Negative Declaration\rdblquote );\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\li72\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj RESOLVED:\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx0\tx720\tx1260\tx1440\tx1620\tab The Council finds that the action described herein will have no significant impact on the environment as set forth in the Negative Declaration.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi864\qj\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928 Pursuant to Section 504 of the General Municipal Law, the Council approves the Designation of the Area.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi270\qj\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928 Pursuant to Section 505(4) of the General Municipal Law, the Council finds that:\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-864\li864\qj\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928     1.\tab The Area is a substandard or insanitary area or is in danger of becoming a substandard or insanitary area and tends to impair or arrest the sound growth and development of the municipality;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-864\li864\qj\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928     2.\tab The financial aid to be provided to the municipality is necessary to enable the project to be undertaken in accordance with the Plan;\par
    \par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-594\li864\qj\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928 3.\tab The Plan affords maximum opportunity to private enterprise, consistent with the sound needs of the municipality as a whole, for the undertaking of an urban renewal program;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-864\li864\qj\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928     4.\tab The Plan conforms to a comprehensive community plan for the development of the municipality as a whole;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-864\li864\qj\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928     5.\tab There is a feasible method for the relocation of families and individuals displaced from the Area into decent, safe and sanitary dwellings, which are or will be provided in the Area or in other areas not generally less desirable in regard to public utilities and public and commercial facilities, at rents or prices within the financial means of such families or individuals, and reasonably accessible to their places of employment; and\par
\par
    6.\tab The undertaking and carrying out of the urban renewal activities in stages is in the best public interest and will not cause any additional or increased hardship to the residents of the Area.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928\par
      \tab Pursuant to Section 505 of the General Municipal Law, the Council approves the Third Amended Melrose Commons Urban Renewal Plan for the Melrose Commons Urban Renewal Area, dated November 2014.\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj Pursuant to Sections 197-d of the City Charter and on the basis of the Decision and Application, and based on the environmental determination and consideration described in this report, C 150153 HUX, incorporated by reference herein, the Council approves the Decision.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928\par
\page\par
Adopted.\par
